mapper.select: SELECT P2.BAS_VAL AS PD_BASE_AMT , P3.PD_CD , P3.PD_HCLSF_ID , P3.PD_MCLSF_ID , P3.PD_LCLSF_ID , P3.PD_DCLSF_ID , P3.SELL_TP_CD , P3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , P1.FNL_VAL , P1.VAT , P1.SELL_FEE , P1.ACKMT_AMT AS ACKMT_PERF_AMT , P1.PD_PRC_FNL_PRP_VAL01 AS ACKMT_PERF_RT , P1.PD_PRC_FNL_PRP_VAL02 AS CVT_PERF_AMT , P1.PD_PRC_FNL_DTL_ID , P1.VER_SN , P1.CTR_VAL , P1.FXAM_FXRT_DV_CD , P1.PD_PRC_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_PRC_FNL_DTL P1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_PRC_DTL P2 ON P1.PD_PRC_DTL_ID = P2.PD_PRC_DTL_ID AND P1.VER_SN = P2.VER_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P3 ON P1.PD_CD = P3.PD_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND P1.PD_CD = #{basePdCd} AND P1.SELL_CHNL_CD = #{sellInflwChnlDtlCd} AND P1.HIST_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_PRC_FNL_DTL_ID = (SELECT MAX(X1.PD_PRC_FNL_DTL_ID) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_PRC_FNL_DTL X1 WHERE P1.PD_CD = X1.PD_CD AND P1.HIST_END_DTM = X1.HIST_END_DTM AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = X1.DTA_DL_YN AND P1.SELL_CHNL_CD = X1.SELL_CHNL_CD)
mapper.insert:
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(CNTR_CST_REL_ID)) + 1, 1) , 15, '0') FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_CST_REL
INSERT INTO TB_SSCT_CNTR_CST_REL ( /* 계약고객관계 */ CNTR_CST_REL_ID /* 계약고객관계ID */ , VL_STRT_DTM /* 유효시작일시 */ , VL_END_DTM /* 유효종료일시 */ , CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD /* 계약단위유형코드 */ , CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , DTL_CNTR_NO /* 상세계약번호 */ , DTL_CNTR_SN /* 상세계약일련번호 */ , COPN_DV_CD /* 법인격구분코드 */ , CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , CNTR_CST_REL_TP_CD /* 계약고객관계유형코드 */ , CNTRT_REL_CD /* 계약자관계코드 */ , INSI_CST_TP_CD /* 내부고객유형코드 */ , LRNN_GRY_CD /* 학습학년코드 */ , CNTR_CH_RCP_ID /* 계약변경접수ID */ ) VALUES ( #{contract.cntrCstRelId} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , '99991231235959' , '020' , #{contract.cntrNo} , #{contract.cntrNo} , #{contract.cntrSn} , #{contract.copnDvCd} , #{cstNo} , '10' , #{contract.cntrtRelCd} -- CNTRT_REL_CD , '' -- INSI_CST_TP_CD , '' -- LRNN_GRY_CD , '' -- CNTR_CH_RCP_ID )

SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(CNTR_PD_REL_ID)), 0) AS CNTR_PD_REL_ID FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL
INSERT INTO TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL ( CNTR_PD_REL_ID , VL_STRT_DTM , VL_END_DTM , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PD_REL_ID , BASE_PD_CD , OJ_PD_CD , PD_REL_TP_CD , RLTG_SPP_OJ_YN , PD_QTY , CNTR_CH_RCP_ID
) SELECT LPAD(#{cntrPdRelId} + ROWNUM, 15, '0') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , '99991231235959' , #{cntrNo} , #{cntrSn} , PD_REL_ID , BASE_PD_CD , OJ_PD_CD , PD_REL_TP_CD , 'N' -- RLTG_SPP_OJ_YN , #{pdQty} , '' -- CNTR_CH_RCP_ID
FROM ( SELECT P1.PD_REL_ID , P1.BASE_PD_CD , P1.OJ_PD_CD , P1.PD_REL_TP_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL P1 WHERE P1.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' -- 기준-제품 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.TEMP_SAVE_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN P1.VL_STRT_DTM AND P1.VL_END_DTM AND P1.BASE_PD_CD = #{basePdCd} UNION ALL SELECT P1.PD_REL_ID , P1.BASE_PD_CD , P1.OJ_PD_CD , P1.PD_REL_TP_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL P1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.OJ_PD_CD = P2.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P3 ON P2.PD_CD = P3.PD_CD AND P3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' WHERE P1.PD_REL_TP_CD = '03' -- 기준-서비스상품 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.TEMP_SAVE_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN P1.VL_STRT_DTM AND P1.VL_END_DTM AND P1.BASE_PD_CD = #{basePdCd} AND P2.SV_PD_TP_CD = #{svPdTpCd} AND P3.PD_PRP_VAL02 = #{svPrd} -- 방문주기(AS-IS LICMON, LCVMON) )
